title.rendered: The adventures of Nap Man — Chris and Charlotte

content.rendered:
It was a rainy day in Tulsa, but Chris was determined to get to the newest exhibit at the Tulsa Historical Society & Museum. Chris closed his umbrella, showed his bus pass to the driver, and found a seat near the back of the bus. It was still early, so Chris closed his eyes in an attempt to take a nap.

Within a few stops, the bus was nearly full. A young lady boarded the bus at the next stop and, looking for a seat, sat by Chris. She was about Chris’ age, and had a lovely smile. Chris looked up and said “hi.”, but the conversation went no further.

At Chris’ stop both he and the young lady that he had sat by got off the bus. It was still raining, and Chris offered to let her share his umbrella. The two entered the museum, and began looking around. It wasn’t long before the two bombed into each other, again, and Chris introduced himself.

“Hi, I’m Chris,” he said. “We shared my umbrella, earlier.”

“I’m Charlotte,” said the young lady, brushing back her long, dark brown hair.

The two continued exploring the paintings of the museum, and the two began walking, together.

“I was thinking about getting a bite to eat,” said Chris, “would you like to join me.”

“Sure,” said Charlotte, “I’m kind of hungry. There’s a nice little sandwich shop next to my apartment,” Charlotte continued.

“Sounds great,” said Chris.

The two left the museum, talking as they waited for the bus. It wasn’t long before the rain stopped, and the sun came out. The bus arrived, and the two found a seat near the back of the bus.

At the sandwich shop, the two ordered turkey and Swiss on rye, and Chris ordered extra tomato. Chris and Charlotte found a seat at a table outside, and continued talking. Chris couldn’t help but gaze into Charlotte’s deep brown eyes.

The two finished their lunch, and exchanged phone numbers.

“I had a good time, Chris,” said Charlotte.

“Me, too,” said Chris. “Maybe we can plan on meeting at the museum next weekend.”

“Sounds great,” said Charlotte.

Charlotte and Chris said goodbye and Charlotte headed off to her apartment.

Was it love at first sight? (to be continued)
